name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill
overview: Just you and your bike - take it on a thrilling ride down an unspoiled mountain landscape. Make your way through thick forests, narrow trails and wild rivers. Race, jump, slide and try not to crash - all the way from the peak to the valley! Key Features: • Travel to the Lonely Mountains! Ride along quiet mountain lakes, majestic forests and steep canyons • A custom physics system lets you carefully drop from boulder to boulder, sprint over abysses or slide through muddy grounds • Find your own way - take a relaxing scenic route or go off-road to find the fastest way to the finish line! • No audience, no barrier tapes - experience a beautiful nature unspoiled by men • Find the perfect bike for your play style and unlock dozens of paint jobs and outfits! • Compete with friends and prove your speed-running skills on the leaderboards
